data.title: Unmanned aerial vehicles in the construction industry - Towards a protocol for safe preparation and flight of drones
data.meta_description: Unmanned aerial vehicles in the construction industry - Towards a protocol for safe preparation and flight of drones - Author: Mariusz Szóstak, Tomasz Nowobilski, Abdul-Majeed Mahamadu, David Caparrós Pérez
